edu.msu.cse.dkvf

Class DKVFBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.msu.cse.dkvf.DKVFBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DKVFClient, DKVFServer

    public abstract class DKVFBase
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class that is used by both DKVFServer and DKVFClient. This class sets up the underlying storage and network services.

      • read

        public Storage.StorageStatus read(java.lang.String key,
                                  java.util.function.Predicate<Record> p,
                                  java.util.List<Record> result)
        Reads the value of the record with the given key that satisfies the given predicate.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the record to read.
        p - The predicate to check for the value.
        result - The value of the record. . Only the first element of the list will be used as the result value. If the list is empty, key does not exists.
        Returns:
        The result of the operation.

      • getStorage

        public Storage getStorage()
        Gets the storage driver object. It will be used whenever we want to call a method of the storage driver that is not provided by the DKVFBase.
        Returns:
        The storage driver object.
